GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
wifi: rtw89: 8852a: rfk: fix div 0 exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 5abc81a138f873ab55223ec674afc3a3f945d60f, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit e3ec7017f6a20d12ddd9fe23d345ebb7b8c104dd. For more details please see the references link.
